channel.title: Amikumu
channel.description: Find and connect instantly with local language partners nearby. We are the only app that supports 7,000+ languages including Catalan, Chinese, Dutch, Esperanto, Irish, Japanese, Occitan, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Toki Pona and Welsh, all for FREE!

item.title: Welcome to the New Amikumu.com!
item.dc:creator: Chuck Smith
item.description: We hope you'll enjoy the new Amikumu.com, which looks a lot like the old Amikumu.com, but is running on a completely different system, so we can more easily translate everything into every language. Stay tuned for more exciting updates coming soon!
